channel.title: [WIP] CastleWars. lol
channel.description:
I need help making a server that u have training in the castlewars lobby, a bank in the bank chest, and no teleing so u cant get out of cw and ppl will actually have to play cw...
[glow=red,2,300]MY IDEA IS[/glow]
-New accounts spawn in CW lobby -Make attack dummys in lobby, for training attack -Make hitting the door train strength, seeing a resemblance to pimpscape... lol -Make searching crates train defence, (now it's obvious a pimpscape copycat...) [glow=green,2,300]-Th[/glow][glow=blue,2,300]is[/glow][glow=red,2,300]hot[/glow]
MUAHAHAHAHA I LOVE CASTLEWARS -.- roflolmao[br][size=1]Posted at: December 06, 2006, 08:36:09 PM[/size][hr]no1 answers me... any1 offering to be part of this coding?

item.title: [WIP] CastleWars. lol
item.dc:creator: @sk8ter sk8ter
item.description:
@sk8ter wrote:

what the…this is the WEIRDEST thing i have ever heard…not the server, but listen to this:

I made this EXACT, i mean EXACT same server about 2-3 months ago. i hosted it for about a month but it got boring so i deleted the source and went on with my life.

this is the 5th topic ive seen just like this.

IT IS NOT A GOOD IDEA! IT GETS BORING!

just to warn you…

also, its easy. it took me literally 5 mins to make it.

Read full topic
